website_summaries.verdict: Customers with extra-large pups will appreciate this oversized memory foam dog bed.
pros: Available in small, medium, large, and extra-large sizes
Bed is five inches thick for supreme comfort and joint protection
cons: Lumpier than a few customers expected

customer_reviews.title: HARD LUMPS
customer_reviews.text: So lumpy my little arthritic Yorkie cannot lie on this bed. The lumps are very firm. At first she tried to snuggle in but just could not get comfortable and got right off each time. Then she finally gave up and ignores it. UPDATE: Better World folks contacted me about the bed not being satisfactory and offered to refund or replace it. I was impressed by their concern and willingness to assure that I was a satisfied customer. Definitely would buy from this company in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Oma

customer_reviews.title: Abysmal
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to like this, it was close to $100 for a dog bed, so assumed it would be really good. However, although I ordered the 46" x 36 ", the cover was the right size, but the filling was about 8" short on the length, so there was a gap at the end. Additionally, the stuffing was width wise baffles that had paw size gaps between them, so would be difficult for my dogs to walk on and be lumpy. Finally, the zip was not done up on it..... because it was jammed. For $100 dogbed, this was abysmal.
customer_reviews.author: Frodo-dog

customer_reviews.title: BEST Ever Dog Bed
customer_reviews.text: Now... THIS is a dog bed extraordinaire! I needed to find a thicker dog bed for my new beagle/Bassett rescue so that 'she of stubby short legs' could actually SEE out the window of my Forester. I looked at and rejected many, actually bought one that was advertised to be 3" thick with memory foam and proved to be about 1.5" of flimsy construction and finally, mercifully found this absolutely perfect dog bed!. This bed may even be more than 5" thick with FIRM memory foam and a well-constructed, easily removeable, waterproof cover of 180 GSM microfiber that is thick enough to provide good footing for four- pawed passengers.
customer_reviews.author: jean in stafford

customer_reviews.title: Started out great but the cover didn't last.
customer_reviews.text: We bought this primarily as we thought it would fit our dog crate well and we were under the impression it would clean well. It fits in the dog crate but unfortunately it's so thick that our dog's chews or toys get easily caught between the bed and the sides of the crate. Not a huge problem-we lined the sides with towels to compensate. As for the ease of cleaning, we were disappointed to see the waterproof part of the liner rip the first time we washed it(according to the directions on the tag). For such an expensive item, it's a real bummer it ended up failing in the first 6 months.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan Wright

customer_reviews.title: Happy pup, happy life.
customer_reviews.text: With any new bed/object it took my dog some getting used to. We got it for him for Christmas and within a week or so he was enjoying it regularly. I've noticed he's able to get up a little quicker without limping or stretching as much as with his old, much thinner bed. It does have some off-gassing, but that is gone now. It does seem to be tad bit on the stuff side, but I think that plays into it's durability. And I've washed the cover once on gentle with zero issues. Overall both me and pup are happy
customer_reviews.author: C. Ehinger

customer_reviews.title: Great Dog Beds!
customer_reviews.text: I am really glad I bought these beds. They are exactly the size and shape I needed to replace the old, lumpy, round beds that didn't fit anywhere. I specifically wanted a firmer bed for my 16 year old lab mix ho has back problems. It did take a little while, as one reviewer mentioned, for our dogs to accept the new beds. For a few days, they bypassed the beds after sniffing at them. I laid some of their "blankies" over the beds, and that did the trick. They look very content and comfy as they nap.
customer_reviews.author: Maxine

customer_reviews.title: Exceeded my expectations
customer_reviews.text: I have not seen my dog on the bed yet, but he normally didn't spend much time in his previous bed. I have seen evidence that he has slept on it when I wasn't looking, though. It will be convenient to take in the car when we travel, since it fits almost anywhere. I can even shove it under the couch if company drops in. I'm happy with this bed, which is thicker than I'd expected; and I'm sure Jimmy will like it more as time goes on. He's slow to accept anything new
customer_reviews.author: Marsha Jordan

customer_reviews.title: The best of the best
customer_reviews.text: A great bed. Easy to clean and the favorite of the pack. Forget the memory foam, it collapses, and don't buy egg crate. It doesn't provide enough support for the heavier dog. This shredded foam provides support and cushioning. The fur balls all love this bed. Easy to clean and holds up to rough play. A favorite among the four legged tail waggers.
customer_reviews.author: HomerTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Perrrfect for cats!
customer_reviews.text: Great felling bed. Comfy for even me. I would love to sleep on it. Great quality. Not overly soft where you fall all the way through it. But soft enough. Bought it thinking my dog would like it over time. Nope! He would rather lay on the floor than sleep on his new bed. And I have had this bed for a few months now. Wish he would use it. But the cat seems to love it!
customer_reviews.author: cinda kleppetsch

customer_reviews.title: Great Deal!
customer_reviews.text: This bed is beautiful. I was skeptical about buying it without seeing it in person, but went by the reviews here and glad I did. So cushy, but springy. I lay down on it to try it out - very comfy. I've only had it a day, so can't comment on how it cleans up, etc., but this is a great deal for the money. I bought the medium size.
customer_reviews.author: Brendiecakes

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.text: This bed is awesome! I have a 74 lb ,14 year old Pit Bull, he's very arthritic with hip dysplasia. He has plenty of room on this bed (large) to get comfy & it has great cushion. Great materials, too. Love that it's waterproof bc he does have accidents sometimes. Love everything about it! Love that 10% of every purchase is donated to animals in need. Very happy with this purchase. Made in the USA! The company emailed to check in, too, great customer service! Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Bridget

customer_reviews.title: Cover...meh
customer_reviews.text: The bed itself is great. Very sturdy and comfortable, as is the plastic cover over the bed. The fabric cover, not so much. I purchased this bed and the first time I tried to unzip the cover to launder the zipper broke. So I requested a refund and ordered another one because the bed itself is really great. The same thing happened yesterday. The zipper gets stuck on bunched up fabric and isn’t strong enough. So, twice in one month I’ve had to stuff this huge bed into a box and haul it to the UPS store to return. I’m done.
customer_reviews.author: joyce casey

customer_reviews.title: Pup approved (her human loves it too)!
customer_reviews.text: Took about a week to really fluff out but my dog loves this bed. It's well made and just the right size for our 65+ lb hound. At first I thought maybe it was too small, because it's a little smaller than her old bed, but she curls up and snores away. So, works for me. The chamber-design looks like it will hold up very well over time. After about a month of use and can't see one dent in the cushioning. That's saying something! Cover is also excellent- waterproofing has been tested and passed (I know, gross, but it's a must) and washes up GORGEOUSLY. Get it- you won't be disappointed, and pup will be on cloud 9.
customer_reviews.author: BonneCassie

customer_reviews.title: Plush waterproof bed.
customer_reviews.text: We loved that the foam is completely waterproof so if the cat decides to pee on the bed we can take the cover off and just wash it. It's very plush and thick padding - our dog loves it. We got the large because we have a big dog. I really like the colors (grey with green apple trim). The only thing I would offer as an option would be to have a version of the material that is slick (like nylon) that the dog hair doesn't stick to. Our dog sheds quite a bit so even though we've only had it for a few days it looks like we've had it for quite some time.
customer_reviews.author: Erin Neumeyer

customer_reviews.title: Very good quality
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this bed to replace an older bed we previously had for our yellow lab. We now have an 8 month old new lab. Her transition was slow on this new bed, since it was not as soft and moldable. However after two weeks she sleeps on it every night along with her blanket and seems quite content. We keep this upstairs and her older bed down. The bed is top quality and would be very supportive for an older dog . It may be a bit stiff for our lab right now, but she will appreciate it more as she grows.
customer_reviews.author: LJ

customer_reviews.title: Great Bed for your dog!
customer_reviews.text: My German Shepherd boy started to come to work with me 2 weeks ago. We have to drive 30 minutes each way to work 6 days a week. I was looking a safe and comfortable bed for him to stay at the back of the car and I found it. He lays down or watches outside during each trip and he doesn't move at all. He used to come to ride in front with me before he got his bed,now he is in his bed. It is very good quality and comfortable as well. I highly recommend this bed to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Figen Aouragh

customer_reviews.title: Wear well, and my dogs love them.
customer_reviews.text: I have to give these five stars (I bought two). While the seams are finally starting to come undone in a few spots, these beds lasted a couple of years for me with three large dogs using them. The stuffing has held up well (although it's not solid memory foam, as one might be led to believe--it's little bits of foam). My dogs still sleep on them, and when I have some time, I will probably mend the gaps in the seams with fishing line or heavy duty thread on my machine. The covers wash well. I between washings, I sprinkle baking soda on the beds and let it sit for a bit before sweeping or vacuuming it up.
customer_reviews.author: Hands On Equine

customer_reviews.title: Seller had horrible, actually non-existent customer service
customer_reviews.text: At first I did like this bed very much. About 9 months after I bought the bed, the cover ripped. I contacted Amazon because I wanted to reach out to the seller & get a new cover since it has a one year warranty. I was even willing to buy the cover. Well, the seller NEVER responded. Now, my dog ripped a whole in the waterproof liner & I came home to stuffing all over the living room. Now we are talking about a greyhound not a big destructive type dog. I contacted Amazon & they said there’s nothing they can do. So, Bye bye Amazon. You had the best customer service- no more I guess.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal

customer_reviews.title: 2 YEARS GOING STRONG
customer_reviews.text: Outstanding product that has held up to daily use of a 70 Lb. GSD OUTSTANDING CUSTOMER SERVICE: We had an issue with the first one of the two we have, and the problem was immediately rectified. Vacuumed daily ( she's a German shedder), and the covers are washed once per month with no excess wear, and NO shrinking so they go back on easy. The covers do a great job of protecting the inner mattress, which after 2 years have not stained, or smelt. The dog loves them, and IF they ever wear out we will purchase 2 more.
customer_reviews.author: Jacquelyn Hemmerich

customer_reviews.title: Our dog usually doesn't like dog beds but with his arthritis acting up
customer_reviews.text: We just got this yesterday and it arrived a week faster than stated (we live overseas). So far, it is holding up and our aging pup (a golden retriever) is really loving his new bed. Our dog usually doesn't like dog beds but with his arthritis acting up, he can no longer get on his preferred couch to sleep. The bed is truly amazing. It came fully packed and super heavy, this is how I knew it would be a good quality. Within a few hours, it puffed up. We put his favorite blanket on top of it and he is comfy as can be. Thanks again, this is an awesome bed for our loving pup.
customer_reviews.author: Jenn

customer_reviews.title: My Dogs Love These Beds!
customer_reviews.text: I have two dogs that weigh between 70 and 80 pounds. I ordered them each an extra large bed as they like to spread out in comfort. Both dogs love these beds. I use these beds for when my dogs are outdoors. Our weather has a tendency to get real wet each night, so I was very interested in the water resistent feature. The beds are heavy, but very sturdy, and very soft. I would highly recommend this bed.
customer_reviews.author: DK

customer_reviews.title: Best dog bed for older dogs
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a large bed for my 90 pound Rottweiler. She has had a double knee surgery, as well as sensitive hips. She spends a lot of time on this bed because it eases her discomfort. I highly recommend this bed for any dog, but especially for those who need a little extra love.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Jilly Bean gives two paws up
customer_reviews.text: My 16 year old, Jilly Bean loves this bed. As you can imagine she has arthritis at this age, but still manages to run around like she's 7. She spends a lot of time on this bed and I feel like it's helped her joints feel a lot better. Definitely worth every penny. She's a 16 pound Italian greyhound mix so she basically has a king size bed, which she deserves since she's the love of my life.
customer_reviews.author: Alice Blue

customer_reviews.title: great for large dogs. Fantastic price
customer_reviews.text: Our dog seems to really like the bed. It’s dense but soft and cushy at the same time. We have a large and long bodied dog. We ordered the largest size. He is comfortable when he curls up. His head hangs over when he stretches out. But that happens with every bed he’s had and he seems to like doing that. In the last two days he’s gotten on this bed more than with other beds. We’re so happy with this bed, I’m ordering another bed for the second floor.
customer_reviews.author: JessicaInFairfax

customer_reviews.title: CHEAPEST ZIPPER, KEPT RIPPING OPEN
customer_reviews.text: Bed seemed soft and nice at first. As soon as the dog walked on the bed the zipper split open. I managed to re zip it and it split again. We had brought this to our vacation home for a weeks vacation and by the end of the vacation there was foam stuffing all over. I ended up throwing in dumpster. SAVE YOUR MONEY
customer_reviews.author: S.V.

customer_reviews.title: Great dog bed!!!
customer_reviews.text: Great bed. Was scared when it first arrived due to it being vacuumed sealed and very flat. After a few hours it expanded to full size bed. Mickey my maltipoo doesn’t have any health issues and hopefully this prevents or helps if any arise. Got this for my oldest dog to show I still love and care about him after multiple life changes ie gf moving in with her cat, getting a puppy, and now the biggest change of all having a child. I’m very excited to treat my pup and support a great company that gives back to the community of pets and pets best friends.
customer_reviews.author: Trevor Burnzy

customer_reviews.title: Very poor quality inner cover.
customer_reviews.text: This is made from small strips of foam, like hundreds of them. The inside cover over the foam strips is incredibly thin and the dog scratching the pet cover of the need to make the bed comfortable is all it takes to rip open the inner cover. Because of this, when you remove the outer cover for cleaning the foam comes out and goes everywhere. Extremely frustrating.
customer_reviews.author: lylazoo

customer_reviews.title: This is our second one
customer_reviews.text: This is our second one. My dogs love this. They tear up every other bed, but they don't do that with this one. The only reason we had to buy a new one is because someone put the pad on the floor while I was washing the cover and the dogs tore up the inside stuffing. When theres a cover on, no amount of scratching or digging will tear it. Easy to clean, hair doesn't stick to it.
customer_reviews.author: MommaK

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality!!!
customer_reviews.text: I'm so happy with this purchase! It shipped super fast and was packaged with care and protection. When I unrolled it within a couple minutes it had risen to about 3 inches. The dogs love it and so do the cats; plus the quality is excellent. I bought it for the "waterproof" covering, but haven't had to deal with that yet so can't say how that is. ***the green is the color I bought because it was $10 cheaper. Update: 2019: I still have this and they love it still. They use it 9 hours a day and ice washed the cover many times. Its held up great with just some minor pilling on the cover. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: NorthernVAgirl

customer_reviews.title: It was great! For a week and a half.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my dog when he got put on crate rest for a back injury. I wanted something really comfy since he'd be laying on it all day. It does seem really comfy... But a week and a half after we got it, the bed cover is literally coming apart at the seams. This isn't From chewing or anything, the stitching is just coming apart from an 18 lbs dog laying on it for under two weeks.
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: Baby loves it!
customer_reviews.text: My puppy, just a year old, has arthritis, which is already crippling. I purchased 2 of these beds, one for the floor and one for his favorite chair, to hopefully help ease his pain. He took to them immediately. These are very well made and attractive. I am very pleased and would definitely recommend this to anyone with a problem in their dog, or an old dog.
customer_reviews.author: MonicaMH

customer_reviews.title: Great bed for my dogs
customer_reviews.text: I have three dogs (1) German Shepherd (2) Cardigan Corgis. I bought the extra large mattress for my 12 year old GSD because I replaced all the carpeting in my house with hard floors. I unrolled it and she was immediately on it and has not left. She has always been finicky about her beds and this is the first one she actually uses. The other two dogs love it as well - good thing I bought three of them. Highly recommend this bed especially to those pet owners that have pets with joint issues
customer_reviews.author: Suzy

customer_reviews.title: Cheap zipper, stained the carpet, dog barely uses it
customer_reviews.text: Looks like a good bed - the zipper is cheap and I had to break it to get the cover off. After I fixed the zipper- my dog REFUSES to lay on it. Overall disappointing Update: we left it out out on the floor and our dog does occasionally lay on it- HOWEVER, the underside has now STAINED our carpet. Also, the zipper split open so many times I have resorted to covering the bed with a sheet rather than to continually repair said zipper. What a waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: Cushiony
customer_reviews.text: So this is the second bed I buy through Amazon. The first one was "tempurpedic" and we spent around $50 on it to find out it was flimsy foam and my dog easily chewed it up. When I received this bed, after ten minutes the foam rises and it was very cushiony. It's really big and my dog loves it so much. She doesn't chew on it. My dog gets hot on my bed so in the middle of the night she'll go sleep on her bed on the floor. It has a nice cool material so she doesn't get hot. I have a 65 lb 7 month Doberman and she LOVES this bed. Totally worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Michelle

customer_reviews.title: I was originally very happy with this bed for our 90 pound 8 year ...
customer_reviews.text: I was originally very happy with this bed for our 90 pound 8 year old dog. However, 4 months after purchasing it, the whole bed seam tore all the way down. It is very clearly not torn up by our dog (who hasn't destroyed anything in 7+ years) but straight down the seam. The inside is made of very obnoxious to clean up shredded pieces. If our dog was a chewer or interested in eating things he shouldn't this could have been very bad! The bed was not moved around but kept in the same spot in his room except to clean around it. Disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: LRW

customer_reviews.title: Quality product
customer_reviews.text: My miniature dachshund is 13.5 years old. He loves this bed. He has had it for about 1 year. The cover is easy to remove. It washes so nicely and it is so easy to put it back on. It has held up so nicely, no wear and tear at all. I highly recommend this bed. It is very thick and comfortable. High quality and well made. You won't be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Lea F.

customer_reviews.title: Great quality dog bed
customer_reviews.text: It’s only been a few days, but this bed looks like it will hold up and not get flat and lumpy. Gummi is only 6 pounds, but he really goes through beds. He seems to like his new memory foam and I think it will be easy to keep clean. (Added photo...Gummi has loved this new bed. He doesn’t dig and tear at it to rearrange the filling and I throw in his little fluffy security blanket and his little world is perfect!)
customer_reviews.author: FramFram Minnesotan

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality
customer_reviews.text: From the minute I opened this bed, our dogs loved it (a 100 lb lab and a 70 lb lab mix). They can even share the bed. Our larger dog is 13 and he doesn't shift around like he used to on his old bed, which shows me that he is much more comfortable. He's sleeping through the night and not roaming the house for a different spot to sleep. We've only had this a few days, but so far, it's a winner! Edit- our dog did manage to poke a hole in the material but I’ll attempt to sew it. This has made it through a few potty accidents and has not made it through the cover.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Dodge

customer_reviews.title: Uncomfortable, clumped hard foam
customer_reviews.text: First thing, I was shipped the wrong color, but that's not a huge issue. I removed the cover and let the foam air for a solid 16+ hours (opened package when it arrived, removed cover, checked the foam before bed and shook it around a bit, then left it over night). It's not the flat sheet it was when it arrived, but it's absolutely not a comfortable, soft, forgiving bed of foam. It's still hard, lumpy and so uncomfortable that my dog has zero interest in it. She would rather lay on the floor next to it than even step on it.
customer_reviews.author: JSB

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service and even better product!
customer_reviews.text: Great product and A+ customer service! Owner is quick to respond to inquiries and correct the problem. Appreciate the fact the owner asked for our feedback to help improve their product to accommodate all dog types. We have 1 senior dog (74 lbs) and 1 young dog (56 lbs) with hip dysplasia. Each bed fits perfectly inside their crate. And it’s noticeable that they take comfort laying on them. Our dogs have different coats and shed differently and we never have issues cleaning their beds. Overall, we (and the dogs) are very satisfied with this product and highly recommend to anyone. Thank you for the great customer service!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Arrived damaged - DONT BUY
customer_reviews.text: Opened the bed today to start prepping for our new puppy and was hit in the face with an over whelming, ungodly smell. So strong it made me a little light headed. Then I noticed the printed insert included with the bed was wet. And its been wet in the package for a while because it has discolored the bottom of the bed. We immediately put it back in the package and set it outside the house, because of the smell. Wish I had opened this bed 3 days ago, when it arrived, rather than trusting that this company shipped us a good product! Would give it a 0 if I could.
customer_reviews.author: Penny

customer_reviews.title: Quality dog bed
customer_reviews.text: We bought this same dog bed 2 years ago. Since then, the cover has had a few holes and the padding is broken open. Honestly, $50 for 2 years of continuous use for my dog is worth it to me. It was finally time to replace ours and I loved this one since it fits in his crate Easily. It’s good quality. The color that arrived was different than what I ordered but I really didn’t mind.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: No Memory Foam, Just Chunks of Foam Pieces
customer_reviews.text: please don't waste your time or money, unless money is a concern. the bed arrived in a tight sealed wrap. the minute i opened this package, i knew this was a bad product. the interior "memory foam" is chunks of foam. don't be fooled by the nice photo and product description. it is hard, has four separate panels sew into cover, under the zipper cover. at first, i thought it needed to allow air to "fluff" to expand. other reviewer did mention that the "memory" foam was chunky. i have many "memory" foam dog beds...this is a just bad product.
customer_reviews.author: Moonlight Glitter Girl

customer_reviews.title: so good. My pit wants to chew on it when ...
customer_reviews.text: “So far, so good. My pit wants to chew on it when I move it. He does so less when it is stationary. We'll see if it survives a few weeks of tooth probes. Size-wise, I thought the largest size would be bigger, but my 60-plus pound pup stretches and is still 95 percent on the bed.”. I've now had it several months. My pup, now 75 lbs + enjoys it and has not chewed it up. His Kong mat is shredded. This one has no rips.
customer_reviews.author: IMGBAT

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again!
customer_reviews.text: These beds are awesome! Super durable, easy to wash and zip back up. My dogs thought they were a bit too hard at first, so I removed a bit of the foam from each section and they love them. Do they show dog hair and slobber? A little, but they’re DOG beds! This is as close to the most perfect dog bed I’ve ever found. A year and a half later and they’ve held up GREAT. Would buy again in a second.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, not waterproof though.
customer_reviews.text: I bought the small for our aging chihuahua with bad knees. She likes soft, layered surfaces and we wanted something to keep her from begging to be on the couch. She still prefers the couch but will sit on the bed without complaint. (She refuses to sit on the floor.) Unfortunately, when she had an accident, it totally soaked through the bed as opposed to the outer lining. Thankfully it survived washing, but she uses it less than before. +5 for being well designed and keeping her on the floor, -1 for false advertising.
customer_reviews.author: Mini Meep

customer_reviews.title: Firm with just enough cush
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this large bed for my senior Springer Spaniel. I was surprised at how much it weighed. It is not going to be sliding around like some of the other beds I have purchased. I let it sit 2 days before setting it out. It is firm with just enough cush to it. Being made of shredded foam I wasn't sure how it would hold up under the weight of the dog. My old 90 pound arthritic lab decided it was just perfect! It is a little small for the lab but just right for a 55 pound Springer Spaniel!
customer_reviews.author: Robin Downey

customer_reviews.title: Great product (+ great values!)
customer_reviews.text: FANTASTIC product on all counts. Aside from delivering on being a very comfortable bed for my dogs (1 bought 2 and glad I did), it's made to last. I have yet to test the waterproof capabilities, but everything from the memory foam to the anti-skid pads on the bottom and the stitching is top notch. One of my dogs is particularly picky with beds and LOVES it. Bonus points that it's made in America and 10% of profits are donated to the Humane Society. What's not to love?? Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Large size is perfect medium fits in crate
customer_reviews.text: My dogs both love this bed. It is exactly what I was looking for, a thick memory foam that is big enough for my 65 lb boy. It is big enough for both dogs together. It supports their weight nicely. The box arrived ripped open, which did not hurt the product because it was double wrapped in plastic. Update: I bought a medium for the crate and he spends half the day in there, because it is comfortable. I had to wash the cover and it came out like new. There has been no flattening of the foam so far. I am still very happy with both large and medium beds.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: If I were a dog, this is the bed I would want.
customer_reviews.text: We just received the bed, so I have not washed it yet, but I have to say...this is the bed you want for your dog! It is SUPER thick and will not flatten into a weird shape. If I were a dog, this is the bed I would want.
customer_reviews.author: JLindy

customer_reviews.title: Very firm memory foam bed.
customer_reviews.text: I bought the large size. It came tightly rolled up. Do not freak out when you open it up and it seems flat and lumpy. There is a tag on it explaining that you need to unzip the cover a bit and let it sit for several hours. It will expand and fluff up. The tag should be much bigger and in a bright color so you don't miss it. This is not a real soft cushy bed. It is very firm but my dog likes it and it hasn't lost it's shape. Seems to be made very well.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie A

customer_reviews.title: So far.. nothing but good things!!!
customer_reviews.text: So far this bed has been everything they have said..it took a couple hours to swell up to its full thickness just like they advised the large one took longer then the bigger bed to fully puff up. I purchased two one large one extra large and my dogs seem to love them so far. They are both around 9 years old so these are great for an older dog, they are not good if your dog is gonna chew the fabric is not for a strong dog bite especially the none slip fabric on the bottom. They delivered it very quickly and the company has reached out to me which is great customer service!!
customer_reviews.author: Dana K McLaughlin

customer_reviews.title: Arrived on time and as described
customer_reviews.text: Seems a very nice dog bed, though I've yet to get my dog to give it a go. Summer heat may be playing a part as he is always seeking the coolest spot to hang out. Still pleased with the purchase and am sure my dog will like it once it cools off.
customer_reviews.author: mark

customer_reviews.title: So comfortable!!
customer_reviews.text: I tested it out to see what the bed feels like, and I wish it was made in human size! It is so comfortable! I have had problems in the past with dog beds flattening in spots, but, though the product is still new, this feels like a unique fabric and construction that will not do that. It is also pretty - nice colors that blend well with a home. Most importantly, my dog loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Robyn G.

customer_reviews.title: Left marks on floor
customer_reviews.text: Our 8 year old Saint loves this bed, and at first we loved it, I picked it up to wash the cover and clean the floor and discovered my beautiful wood floor is streaked w black marks that I can not remove. Will probably need expensive professional cleaning to remove them. It’s stained!
customer_reviews.author: nancyk

customer_reviews.title: Great bed, great value! Dog approved.
customer_reviews.text: My dogs love this bed. I bought it as a replacement for one of my dogs whose bed was ready for retirement, and I'll likely have to buy another one since they argue about who gets to use it! Both of my dogs are 80-85 pound shepherd mixes, and this bed is big enough for either of them to stretch out full length. It is a little stiff from the waterproof layer underneath, but as the seller suggested, I put a blanket on it and you'd never notice.
customer_reviews.author: C. W. Smith

customer_reviews.title: He Loves It!
customer_reviews.text: I waited to write up a review to see how my pet took the bed. I didn't necessarily worry, but even if I had all worries were assuaged upon seeing our friend sleep soundly on his new bed. Our family dog has gotten up there in age and I was looking for something to keep him comfortable at night, and during the day. Needless to say, he loves his bed. His snores are louder, and that only made me all the more happy. Thank you for a quality product; I highly recommend this product to anyone with an aging friend of their own.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Excellent customer care, though my dogs didn't care for the beds
customer_reviews.text: Update-- company rep contacted me about my satisfaction (without being contacted). When I explained, the offered to refund the cost and suggested donating to a local shelter. Excellent coustomer care. Thank you! bought two-- a medium and a large. My dogs won't touch them. I tried putting a blanket over them and giving my dogs a treat when they laid on them, but they quickly got off the beds. They aren't very soft at all. I would return them, but once you unwrap them, they'd be impossible to repackage.
customer_reviews.author: Califcari

customer_reviews.title: Very Durable
customer_reviews.text: My dog had to acclimate to a new bed and that took a while. About a week later he is unsung it daily, so I know he likes it. Very durable
customer_reviews.author: Susanna Isabeau

customer_reviews.title: Great dog bed
customer_reviews.text: Great dog bed. My senior 60 lb. doberman was a little hesitant to get on this bed at first, but she's grown to love it now. She has an incontinence issue and some arthritis, so I really wanted something that could withstand accidents and also provide her good support. The foam is very thick and hasn't shown any signs of wear yet after 3 months of use. The cover does have a waterproof inner lining which offers great protection, and is easy to throw in the washer. I'm satisfied with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: sandyc

customer_reviews.title: DISAPPOINTING
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed with this. I have had it uncovered for over 24 hours and as you can see from the photos it hasn't plumped up. The memory foam inside is still as hard as it was when I took the cover off. This definitely is very upsetting as I cant even use it for my dog.
customer_reviews.author: Cathie L. Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Poor Zipper Quality, Easily Destroyed
customer_reviews.text: The zipper on this bed is not appropriate for this application and splits easily if you are trying to remove the cover to wash. Also, the internal bed is shredded foam inside of a flimsy fabric. Once the zipper was split the first time, it happened again easily. The bed lasted three months with a non-aggressive chewer. Overpriced for the quality.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren PW

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product!
customer_reviews.text: Thank you Better World Pets for this wonderful bed. My 4 year old chihuahua just under went two orthopedic surgeries and I was on the hunt of a comfy yet supporting bed. I can definitely say I have found the right one. After opening the package and letting the bed takes its form my chihuahua shorty who is only 6 lbs was able to rest peacefully. The bed is very spacious for him and that is exactly what I wanted. Now one little detail that I was hoping would work for us is that it did not fit into his crate that measures 26 in x 18 in . Overall we are 100% satisfied with our purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Aims09

customer_reviews.title: My dog loves this bed!
customer_reviews.text: This bed is great. I allowed a full day for the bed to "inflate" after I received it. The cover has a zipper on it, making it easy to take on and off. The cover is soft and seems to be made of good quality material also. My dog, who is always underfoot and never leaves my side, loves to lay in this bed! He has arthritis and getting up and down is hard for him now, especially with his old bed. But he spent the whole afternoon in his new bed and couldn't be bothered to get up lol. I'm very pleased with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Mcneil

customer_reviews.title: Great dog bed
customer_reviews.text: Our dogs love the bed and it appears to be very well made. Definitely one of the better beds that we have purchased over the years. Highly recommended. Addendum: We (and our dogs) like the first one so much that we bought a second bed (next size down) for our smaller dog. And then we bought a third one (same extra large size) to put in another location. This last purchase seemed to be more tightly packed and did not want to smooth out as evenly as the very first bed. We are hoping that with time, it will become the same smooth, comfortable surface.
customer_reviews.author: bob_e99

customer_reviews.title: Batman Loves It!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this bed for my 100 lb Great Pyrenees mix rescue dog, Batman. He loves it! And I love that it has a waterproof cover so I won’t be throwing out another bed if he has an accident, aka a flood! I let it expand during the day and the minute I laid it down in Batman’s room that night he jumped on top and looked just as pleased as the pup in your ad does. Great bed. Thank you! Now I’ll have to order more for the other dogs.
customer_reviews.author: Kieradee1

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality
customer_reviews.text: The bed's construction is very good and really seems like it will hold up for a long time. The dogs seemed a bit wary of it first but it didn't take long for them to add it to their menu. It isn't as large as two of the other beds so when they really want to stretch they don't choose it. I decide to put one in each of their crates. They fit well and they sleep like babies. Another thing I noticed was they don't seem to do the nest thing on theses. You know, pawing toward the center, turning in a circle before they lay down. That's how a lot of their other beds were destroyed.
customer_reviews.author: Ramona

customer_reviews.title: This awesome well built bed arrived in a timely manner and ...
customer_reviews.text: This awesome well built bed arrived in a timely manner and was packaged and protected while in the box. I had ordered this bed to donate to a Pet Rescue Group. The color I chose was the blue grey which was very beautiful and soothing to look at. The materials and fabric of the bed were exceptionally made and I love that the cover is indestructible and is machine washable. I would definitely order this bed again in the near future. Wonderfully made through and through orthopedic bed and the price was right too.
customer_reviews.author: D.

customer_reviews.title: great bed for dogs that need that extra support and comfort
customer_reviews.text: beds came quickly and are of real good quality,one of the 2 did not puff up as much as the other and the manufacturer stepped up and gave me a promo code to get a 3rd one for super duper discount.In my eyes that separates a good company from a great one --how they deal with any issues after the sale-which they passed with straight A's.Highly recommend them. update---replacement bed came and puffed right up--amazing company that really cares and totally stands behind their product and whats to be the best they can be.
customer_reviews.author: john schroeck

customer_reviews.title: I really like the bed but it is smaller than I expected
customer_reviews.text: I really like the bed but it is smaller than I expected, so far the dogs have not taken to it as they are used to the old ratty ones. I may order a larger one for the larger dogs once my little guy starts using it, at the time you were out of the next size up which is what I really wanted and I should have waited till they were available. I like the thickness of it and the idea that it is waterproof and it seems well made.
customer_reviews.author: joan roberts

customer_reviews.title: The cover is sturdy and looks good as well
customer_reviews.text: The bed seems to be very well made. The cover is sturdy and looks good as well. The bed is advertised as 5" thick but is only 4' thick. It was vacuum packed and I did let it breathe awhile. Because it was packed so tightly it had creased in the middle and the shredded foam had separated in the middle leaving no support in the very middle of the bed. I tried to shake it and fluff it, but the center still had no filling. I sent it back and purchased a dog bed that is a solid piece of memory foam.
customer_reviews.author: Maggie .

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and easy to clean !
customer_reviews.text: Love how easy it is to clean ! Our big girl loves it to , she doesn't want to get up now and sleeps all night ! Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Barb

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic!
customer_reviews.text: Once you receive the bed and take it out of the box, you have to wait two hours for it to "fluff" back up again. I put the bed down on the ground and my dog only layed on the floor but with a little coaxing we eventually got her to lay on it. Everytime she would lay on the floor rather then that bed. After some time (maybe about a day or two) she lays on it on her own and now she absolutely loves her bed! She brings all her toys and even her treats and takes it to her bed. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: rennie

customer_reviews.title: Bed left residue/stain on floor that I cannot remove
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this bed for a large (90lb. dog). It is nice and large which allows him to stretch out. However, since the one month I purchased this bed the "nubs" on the floor side of the cover have left what appears to be a permanent stain. I have tried about 5 products to remove the black staining and dots but to no avail.
customer_reviews.author: DeborahP

customer_reviews.title: Seems to be a great product and my dog loves it
customer_reviews.text: Seems to be a great product and my dog loves it, would give it 5 stars but zipper was broken when opened the package. I bought this specific bed over cheaper ones bc it had the option to take cover off and wash it. Not now that zipper is broken. Would love a replacement cover for this one that is broken. UPDATE: 10/3/2016 Company is sending me a free replacement cover. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Zabel

customer_reviews.title: This is the best and most comfortable bed my fur babies have ever ...
customer_reviews.text: This is the best and most comfortable bed my fur babies have ever had! I even want to lay on their bed!! Shipping was fast, product itself is perfect and exactly as described and my pups couldn't be happier with their new bed! The owner of the company also answered my questions lightening fast and really shows that he cares and takes care of his customers. This is exactly the type of company I would love to keep coming back to and recommending to friends and family.
customer_reviews.author: J. Trinh

customer_reviews.title: Great Bed!
customer_reviews.text: We bought the Better World dog bed partly because its overall size was perfect for a bed frame we already had and also because it is made in the US. It is well-made and the mattress is definitely comfortable and substantial. The waterproof aspect of the bed will save a lot of laundry and odor issues, however our dog initially did not care for the sound of the waterproof membrane until we received a suggestion from Better World Pets about that very problem. We added a cloth layer between the cover and the membrane and now she uses her bed constantly. As a bonus, its attractive colors make it a nice addition to the room.
customer_reviews.author: Til U Drop

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy!!!
customer_reviews.text: The bed seems very sturdy and is heavy. The first time it was to be used, I ended up with a hole in the super-thin white cover holding the memory foam, which is more like cut up pieces of carpet pad. Supposed to have a one year warranty. I've left 4 different messages by phone, email and messenger and not one reply or call back. Poor customer service and even bigger cheap product. Buy from a reputable company instead of Better World Pets.
customer_reviews.author: Kevan Huston

customer_reviews.title: Great, heavy, waterproof bed
customer_reviews.text: We loved our first bed so much we bought a second. They stand behind their 1 year guarantee. When my doberman puppy tore off the piping and removed all the stuffing from her first bed, they promptly sent a promo code for a replacement. Worth the price for that alone. I love that the beds are big, water proof, soft, and too heavy and sturdy for my dog to pick up and fight with.”
customer_reviews.author: JJ

customer_reviews.title: My dog loves it.
customer_reviews.text: It's perfect for my dog. She took to it right away. No hesitation. Walked right on and laid down. Her favorite place for sleeping. She is 70 lbs and getting older. Not able to get up on the couch anymore. The height of this is just right. She sinks in just enough to be comfortable but can still get off it easily. I think it is well made, good fabric. My dog loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Michele

customer_reviews.title: The puppies love it!  And I love that they haven't destroyed it.
customer_reviews.text: It's so hard to find a water proof dog bed that is also washable, cute, and comfortable. But I finally did! I have 2 of these dog beds, side by side for my puppies. They have not chewed it apart or ripped it...and believe me, they are both teething! They snuggle up on these beds even when there is space available on the couch.....quite an endorsement!
customer_reviews.author: lcm

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Bed for Large, Entitled Dog
customer_reviews.text: Product is exactly as advertised and just the right size for our English Cream golden retriever! The bedding only took an hour to expand and the cover is easy to fit. Our dog loves it! No pressure points or sagging. There is no chemical smell!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Here's the deal
customer_reviews.text: I had reason to get up close and personal with these beds. I bought three. I had reason to take them apart. I was awe-struck! These things aren't just designed, they are engineered! Awesome. Fantastic. Any dog should be proud to own this bed. The 5th star, sadly, is the combined agreement of my three West Highland Terriers. I couldn't pay these dogs to sleep on these beds.
customer_reviews.author: Zazzafrazzles

customer_reviews.title: Awesome bed for the price!
customer_reviews.text: My six dogs love them! These are thick, heavy (very heavy) beds. For the price, I was expecting something flimsier that would go flat in a couple of months. But was pleased to find that the beds are dense but still cushion-y with a durable cover that will hold up to the pre-nesting scratching my dogs like to do before settling down. Thanks for such a quality product. The one year warrantee is a nice bonus too. PS... no strange smell as one reviewer had noted
customer_reviews.author: lisa s.

customer_reviews.title: Not a bad bed, but not fabulous either.
customer_reviews.text: We have a Big Barker and another expensive dog bed. (299.00) This bed was purchased so I didn't have to move the other beds to the bedroom from the living room when we went to sleep. This bed is heavy and seems much harder then our Big Barker. It's noisy when our dog moves at night and the sound actually wakes us up. The company recognizes this noise is a problem and does offer a suggested fix, which we will be trying this weekend. I don't think I would buy this bed again.
customer_reviews.author: luvskuls

customer_reviews.title: An awesome company, worth trying, even if your dog doesn’t like the bed
customer_reviews.text: My old arthritic dog actually didn’t like this bed, even though it seems really durable and well-cushioned, he wouldn’t use it for some reason. He is old and weird though. But I am giving 5 stars because when I contacted the company about a return (the Amazon return window had closed) they were super helpful with a refund and actually just asked me to donate the bed to an animal shelter rather than send it back. So that’s pretty cool. They really are trying to make a better world. I will definitely try them again in the future, as their products are clearly good quality and they are clearly a quality company!
customer_reviews.author: Bobby M Bennett Jr

customer_reviews.title: the "MF" is in bits and pieces making it easy for 2 small yorkies (5lbs and 7lbs) to tear ...
customer_reviews.text: the bed is filled with memory foam. however, the "MF" is in bits and pieces making it easy for 2 small yorkies (5lbs and 7lbs) to tear open the material (cover & zipper) and spread the inner "MF" all over their "bedroom", within in 24 hours. It was a good idea...bad execution. this product is now being re-made with better material outer cover and zipper.
customer_reviews.author: Doc's N

customer_reviews.title: Not comfortable for my elderly dog or me.
customer_reviews.text: Our elderly German Shepherd has a bad hip. I was hoping she would take to this bed based on the good reviews. Unfortunately she won’t lay on it and stumbles when she tried to get on or off it. The other reviews with low ratings seem to be more accurate. It seems to feel uncomfortable to her as there are 5 lines within the material and where it’s sewed together. I even tried to lay on it and it wasn’t very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: A. Fields

customer_reviews.title: Good but.....
customer_reviews.text: It took my pups a couple days to warm up to this bed. I think the main problem was that it wasn't soft enough on top. I ended up folding a blanket to lay on top so there was the plushness that they were use to from other beds. I think it give them good support especially my beagle who has the start of arthritis in her left hip. Once I put the blankets on with the extra plushness they both loved them. Just a suggestion to consider in the future. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Judy Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Nice.
customer_reviews.text: I have a 12 year old cat-kid that has a lot of problems walking and has begun sleeping on the tile in the kitchen. I bought this hoping he would take to it, and because of his size this product could also allow him to stretch out comfortably. He does sit on it and one afternoon he even napped on it, but unfortunately it seems it was a failed experiment. It's a nice product and I'm sure it would be make a fantastic dog bed, so on that front I give it four stars. I took away a star because the zipper popped off after I unwrapped it and I had to glue it back on...
customer_reviews.author: Zeddicus 2018

customer_reviews.title: But she has been using it more as time goes on but it was not love at first sight as I hoped
customer_reviews.text: Our older lab likes this but it took a while. I think it was too stiff for her at first. But she has been using it more as time goes on but it was not love at first sight as I hoped. I haven't washed the cover yet but that was a big selling feature to me. Updated Oct 2018 - bed is still too stiff for my dog.
customer_reviews.author: Amy S

customer_reviews.title: My dog actually chooses this bed over the couch sometimes!
customer_reviews.text: I just adopted a 6 year old pit bull who rarely sees any reason to leave the couch. But we're working on crate training, so I bought this in an attempt to make her crate a super cozy little den that she actually wants to spend time in- and it seems to be working! Now my dog actually leaves the couch voluntarily to take naps on this bed, so I consider that her seal of approval. Also, this bed fits perfectly in her crate, and I like that the cover is removable and washable- I haven't washed it yet though, so I can't comment on how well it holds up but it seems very well made.
customer_reviews.author: Alison

customer_reviews.title: Makes a Fabulous confetti party. 😁
customer_reviews.text: Well I can honestly say they liked enough to feel bad about it after they killed it. They are not avid bed destroyers but they had a field day with this one. Not sure the motivation behind the party but it didn't seem to take them too much work to nip the zipper open then throw the stuffing everywhere. 5 stars for the ability to wash the cover and the softness. Have to go with 1 for durability as we have only used it for about a month.
customer_reviews.author: Darth Octane

customer_reviews.title: My old dog with bad arthritis loves this bed
customer_reviews.text: We got the medium size bed for our dog who is now 14 years old and has joint issues He loves it -- is very happy cuddling and snoozing on it for hours at a time. With his old bed, he'd get up and re-position himself to get comfortable about every 30-45 minutes. Anyhow, I'm thinking now of getting the smaller bed for our smaller, younger dog since she likes to jump on there whenever my boy leaves for a bit.
customer_reviews.author: DDM

customer_reviews.title: Lasted 2 1/2 years
customer_reviews.text: It began to flatten out in the center after a couple of years, and then my dog began clawing at it to "fluff it up". He finally clawed a hole in the center and the rest is history. While it was good it was really good. I'm thinking of replacing it with a less expensive bed yearly.
customer_reviews.author: eldeetx

customer_reviews.title: The bed is durable and comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: My dogs love this bed. I’ve owned it for a few years. It has survived two energetic puppies and a 14-year-old with severe arthritis. The bed is sturdy, holds its shape, and is easy to clean. Unlike some beds, this one doesn’t hold on to doggie odors. The washable cover protects the bed from urine, vomit, etc.... The only problem I’ve had is one of the puppies ‘nibbled’ the cover. Wish there were Better World replacement covers. When this bed wears out, I’ll definitely buy another one.
customer_reviews.author: SEL

customer_reviews.title: Best bed ever.
customer_reviews.text: I just got it but I'm already amazed. We got it out, let it air out and put it in our room for our senior girl. She's an 80 pound lab, 11 years old so she needs some pampering. The thickness is impressive and the cushion feel will really help her joint pain. But the final sign off came from Scooby herself. She found the new bed and immediately took a nap. She is very pleased!
customer_reviews.author: Jamie LaVite

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased
customer_reviews.text: We recently ordered 2 beds. We have a large Lab/Newfoundland/Chow/Retriever mix and a Beagle who thinks she's a big dog. Both are older - 10 and 8 - and we needed new beds that would be kind to their bones. The shipment came quickly and we let them "puff" for 2 days before presenting to the dogs. They appear to be very well made and nice and thick. In particular, the big dog is sleeping much better. The app isn't letting me load a photo, but we have two happy critters.
customer_reviews.author: Coreen B

customer_reviews.title: This Orthodpedic Memory Foam is so thick and comfortable for my dog
customer_reviews.text: This dog bed was delivered yesterday and my dog loves it! I needed to replace the old one because when I removed the cover to wash it, I realized how disintegrated the inside foam was. This Orthodpedic Memory Foam is so thick and comfortable for my dog. She jumped in and stayed there which surprised me because she was used to her smell in the old one. It is made of high quality sturdy thick foam. And I don't see this memory foam disintegrating like the regular foam ones. Perfect for hip dysplasia too.Anyway, I have to say she loves this one and I'm happy I chose it.
customer_reviews.author: Maryanne Cianfrani

customer_reviews.title: GREAT thick supportive dog beds.  I am very happy with them!
customer_reviews.text: Best dog bed I've ever bought, and I've bought quite a few in the past 30 years or so. It is SO thick and SO supportive. We have 3 older dogs, and they love these beds...very comfortable for their old bones. I haven't had to take the covers off yet to wash them, but so far, these are great, orthopedic beds. I highly recommend them!
customer_reviews.author: Gayle
